getPaymentMethodDefault

public PaymentMethodMx getPaymentMethodDefault()

setPaymentMethodDefault

public void setPaymentMethodDefault(PaymentMethodMx paymentMethodDefault)
Pre selected default payment method. For example, if you want to pre select VISA: PaymentMethodMx.VISA= “mx_visa”. If you don’t want to see any pre selected methods, you should leave this parameter null.

addPaymentMethod

public void addPaymentMethod(PaymentMethodMx paymentMethod)
adds a payment method with no specific installments. All installments will be offered by default.

installments -
